column2: Catch Me On Laura Ingraham Tonight
column5: I will be on the Laura Ingraham show on Fox News tonight at 10 Eastern 9 Central talking about the Chauvin verdict. Alan Dershowitz and I will be on at the top of the hour. I think the focus will be on Chauvin’s chance of a successful appeal but that could change by show time. The only way to know for sure is to tune in! I will post my thoughts on the verdict here in much more depth tomorrow.
